constants.description: Stores the value that indicates that the AddOrModifySvcApptAttendees flow is invoked and the service appointment attendee enrollment summary is shown on the parent flow’s confirmation screen.
constants.name: CompositeMode

constants.description: Stores the value that indicates that the service appointment mode is Group.
constants.name: Group

constants.description: Stores the value that indicates that the service appointment mode is Regular.
constants.name: Regular

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the picklist choice set used in the Group Appointment Access Type option on the ScreenSelectGroupServiceAppointmentDetails screen.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChoiceUsersAddedAsAttendeesAndExperienceSiteUsers

fields.name: Error_Screen
fields.fieldText: An error occurred. Please contact your System Administrator.

fields.name: Header
fields.fieldText: Review Service Appointment

fields.name: SADetails
fields.fieldText:
Account : {!Get_Account_Record.Name}


Sales Order : {!ServiceAppointment.Sales_Order__r.Name}


Work Type Group Name : {!Get_Work_Type_Group.Name}


Service Territory : {!ServiceAppointment.ServiceTerritory.Name}


Address : {!ServiceAppointment.Street}, {!ServiceAppointment.City}, {!ServiceAppointment.State}, {!ServiceAppointment.Country}

fields.name: SchedTime
fields.fieldText:
﻿Scheduled Start : {!ServiceAppointment.SchedStartTime}


﻿﻿Scheduled End : {!ServiceAppointment.SchedEndTime}

stages.description: Stores the label and order for the stage where the flow user enters the group appointment details. This label is displayed on the progress bar when the user runs this flow.
stages.name: SelectGroupAppointmentDetailsStage
stages.label: Select Group Appointment Details

variables.description: Stores a value that indicates the appointment category of the service appointment.
variables.name: AppointmentCategory

variables.description: Stores the appointment mode selected for the service appointment.
variables.name: appointmentMode

variables.description: Stores an encrypted token that’s used to identify the service appointment that the flow user created.
variables.name: AppointmentToken

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: variable to hold values of distance units
variables.name: distanceUnit

variables.description: Stores the developer name of the email template that’s sent to the service appointment attendee for enrollment or unenrollment.
variables.name: EmailTemplate

variables.description: The ID of the selected Engagement Channel Type.
variables.name: engagementChannelTypeId

variables.description: Specify a comma-separated list of service resource IDs. Depending on the page, these IDs are used to filter work type groups, service territories, or service resources.
variables.name: FilterByResourceIds

variables.description: Stores a boolean value that indicates whether to display or hide the appointment mode selection options.
variables.name: HideAppointmentModeSelectionOptions

variables.description: Specify whether to display ST OH or not
variables.name: hideStOh

variables.description: Stores the prefix for the group appointment enrollment URL for unauthenticated users.
variables.name: InvitationURLPrefixGuest

variables.description: Stores the prefix for the group appointment enrollment URL for the first experience site.
variables.name: InvitationURLPrefixSite1

variables.description: Stores the prefix for the group appointment enrollment URL for the second experience site.
variables.name: InvitationURLPrefixSite2

variables.description: Stores the maximum number of attendees who can be added to a group appointment.
variables.name: MaximumAttendeeLimit

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName

variables.description: Stores the prefix for the URL that opens the page that allows the flow user to unenroll from the service appointment.
variables.name: UnenrollUrlPrefix
